document_data.mainbody:
Aliah was a princess of Payit in Maztica some time before the 14 century DR.
During Payits Golden Age, Aliah was a princess who was promised to her half-brother, Xetl. However, Tacal, a prince of Tulom-Itzi, decided that Aliah should be his. So he decided to kidnap her with the help of his retinue.
On the day of the wedding, Tacal and his warriors managed to kidnap Aliah but only with the deaths of most of his warriors. At last, in revenge, the Payit decided to slay the whole royal family of Tulom-Itzi, who had been guests at the wedding with no knowledge of Tacals plan. When Tacal, still surrounded by Ulatoss armies, saw at a distance the bodies of his family, he killed Aliah out of desperation. Soon after, Payit arrows killed Tacal.
This act signaled the end of the Payit Golden Age.
